LibraryFunction: ^"They have a whole stock of fiction and non-fiction stuff here, for all your literary needs"
^"There's also a book club that meets a few times a week"
^[Timothy] "It's... um... a little claustrophobic in here."
^] "Yeah... they fit a lotta books into a small space."
^"They have book recomendations, if you find the selection overwhelming."
^"This week's recomendation is... Lessons in Grace by Tybalt Lyndel."
WeekOne: ^Hmm... not sure what that one's about.
^"I haven't really spent much time in here, but I probably should..."

c: ^"But yeah, you want to browse around the selection?"
^"But yeah, you want to check that recomended book out?"

Repeat: ^"what kind of books do you like Timothy?"
^] "cool, like, choose you own adventure books?"
^"really, adventure books in general are pretty cool..."
^] "neat. We should see if they have any here."
